response.original_title: Spike & Mike's Festival of Animation: Volume 3
response.overview: A compilation of 8 innovative animated films, including Academy Award nominees "Blindscape", "The monk and the fish" and the often-requested animation of "Screen play."  Contents:  Screen play / by Barry J.C. Purves (10:50)  Frannies Christmas / by Mike Mitchell (2:00)  Streetsweeper / by Serge Elissalde (6:20)  Dirdy Birdy / by John R. Dilworth (7:00)  Blindscape / by Stephen Palmer (8:00)  Monk and the fish / by Michael Dudok De Wit (6:00)  Iddy Biddy beat boy / by Mo Willems (4:30)  Britannia / by Joanna Quinn (7:30)
response.tagline: More of the best in animated short film
response.title: Spike & Mike's Festival of Animation: Volume 3
